name: KLP48
description: '''KLP48''' (read as ''K.L.P. Forty-Eight'') is a [[Malaysians|Malaysian]] [[Teen idol|idol]] [[girl group]] based in [[Kuala Lumpur]]. They are the tenth international [[AKB48 Group|sister group]] of [[AKB48]], after [[Indonesia]]'s [[JKT48]], [[China]]'s [[SNH48]] (dissociated), [[Thailand]]'s [[BNK48]], [[Philippines]]'s [[MNL48]], [[China]]'s [[AKB48 Team SH]], [[Taiwan]]'s [[AKB48 Team TP]], [[Vietnam]]'s [[SGO48]] (''disbanded''), Thailand's [[CGM48]], and [[India]]'s [[DEL48]] (''disbanded''). The group was announced on January 1, 2024. The 1st generation members were announced on July 27, 2024.
